title: MMPP: Audio Story and Podcasting Practicum
description: Production-oriented course involving diverse audio media forms. Critically analyze journalistic podcasts, features, documentaries, diaries, place-casts, and news shorts to evaluate what makes for compelling and effective audio as a contemporary storytelling form. Students will gain technical and production skills to facilitate their own creativity in the audio sphere. Prerequisites: COMM 10 and COMM 101.
